p:
Significantly positive correlations were observed with Maximum temperatuer
t−2 , Maximum temperatuer
t−3 , Maximum RH
t−0 , Maximum RH
t−1 , and Wind speed
t−2 and total mosquito count in 3 rd Kurana study area and significantly negative correlations were observed with Rainfall
t−2 , Rainy days
t−2 , Minimum RH
t−2 and Maximum RH
t−2 .
